text: "Keep the Faith" is a 1992 song by American hard rock band Bon Jovi and is the leading single from their fifth studio album of the same name. It went to number 1 in Norway and Portugal, number 2 in Greece, number 3 in Switzerland, number 4 in New Zealand, number 5 in Canada, Ireland and the United Kingdom, number 7 in Sweden, number 8 in Germany, number 9 in Iceland and number 10 in Australia and the Netherlands. ==Releases== == References == Category:1992 songs Category:Bon Jovi songs Category:Hard rock songs
title: Keep the Faith (Bon Jovi song)
